TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件为可取消事件。The event is a cancelable event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定列索引和宽度以及是否取消该事件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the column index and width and whether to cancel the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传入以 `true` 获取 `cancel` 参数将导致宽度更改被取消，列将恢复为其以前的大小。Passing in `true` for the `cancel` parameter will cause the width change to be canceled, and the column will return to its previous size.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置列的新宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the new width for the column.
The new width for the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件时 ， 可以通过属性验证新的宽度是否满足应用程序的要求，并调整宽度或取消事件（如果没有）。When handing the event, the property enables you to verify whether the new width meets the requirements of your application and to either adjust the width or cancel the event if it does not. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
